/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding to the overall vibrancy of the scene. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
